attributes.action: close schools till september 2021 amd  let the children restart the year.
attributes.additional_details:
home schooling isnt working for a lot of familes.
parents are not teachers and dont have the facalities and resources to help their children. even live lessons are a problem with internet lagging, people not having enough latops etc

chidren have missed too much school and are going to struggle to catch up
attributes.background:
close schools . stop remote learning and reopen them in september 2021 and let all children restart the year
it means children leave at 17 instead of 16 and start school a year later at 5 instead of 4
